original_text: And there was there with us a young man, an Hebrew, servant to the captain of the guard; and we told him, and he interpreted to us our dreams; to each man according to his dream he did interpret.
korean_text: 그 곳에 친위대장의 종 된 히브리 청년이 우리와 함께 있기로 우리가 그에게 말하매 그가 우리의 꿈을 풀되 그 꿈대로 각 사람에게 해석하더니

sentences.original_text: And there was there with us a young man
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리와 함께 한 젊은 남자가 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: servant to the captain of the guard
and he interpreted to us our dreams
to each man according to his dream
